New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [1,630pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Chaos - Slaanesh) [1,430pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [500pts]

      • Bladebringer on Exalted Seeker Chariot [220pts]

        Selections: 2. Pendant of Slaanesh, 3. Hysterical Frenzy, 4. Strongest Alone, 5. Hunter of Godbeasts, Bladebringer's Flensing Whip, Daemonettes' Piercing Claws, General, Steed's Poisoned Tongue

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, EXALTED CHARIOTS, HERO, SLAANESH, BLADEBRINGER, WIZARD, Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Pendant of Slaanesh, Command Trait: Hunter of Godbeasts, Strongest Alone, Spell: Hysterical Frenzy, Unit: Bladebringer on Exalted Seeker Chariot, Unit Abilities: Excess of Blades, Pungent Soulscent, Weapon: Bladebringer's Flensing Whip, Daemonettes' Piercing Claws, Steed's Poisoned Tongue


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Pendant of Slaanesh At the start of your hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to the bearer.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Hunter of Godbeasts Add 1 to the damage inflicted by successful attacks made by this general that target a MONSTER.
        Strongest Alone You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this general while there are no other friendly models within 6" of this general.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Hysterical Frenzy 7Pick 1 enemy unit wholly within 18" of the caster that is visible to them, and roll 1 dice for each model in that unit. For each 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bladebringer on Exalted Seeker Chariot 10"10104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Excess of Blades Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model finishes a charge move. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-4, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 5+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Pungent Soulscent At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, for each 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bladebringer's Flensing Whip Melee2"63+4+-11
        Daemonettes' Piercing Claws Melee1"93+4+-11
        Steed's Poisoned Tongue Melee1"83+4+-1

      • Infernal Enrapturess [140pts]

        Selections: Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody, Heartstring Lyre: Euphonic Blast, Ravaging Claw

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, HERALD OF SLAANESH, HERO, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, Leader

        Unit: Infernal Enrapturess, Unit Abilities: Discordant Disruption, Harmonic Alignment, Versatile Instrument, Weapon: Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody, Heartstring Lyre: Euphonic Blast, Ravaging Claw


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Infernal Enrapturess 6"5105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Discordant Disruption Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS that are within 24" of one or more models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that WIZARD suffers D3 mortal wound after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out.
        Harmonic Alignment At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 depravity point for each friendly INFERNAL ENRAPTURESS that is on the battlefield and part of a Slaanesh army.
        Versatile Instrument Before attacking with a heartstring lyre, choose either the Cacophonous Melody or Euphonic Blast missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody Missile18"63+4+-11
        Heartstring Lyre: Euphonic Blast Missile24"12+3+-3D3
        Ravaging Claw Melee1"33+4+-11

    • Battleline [330pts]

      • Daemonettes [110pts]

        Selections: 10 Daemonettes [110pts], Banner Bearer(s), Hornblower(s), Icon Bearer(s), Piercing Claws

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SLAANESH, Battleline

        Unit: Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Unit Abilities: Alluress, Banner Bearers, Hornblower, Icon and Standard Bearers, Icon Bearer, Lithe and Swift, Weapon: Piercing Claws


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Daemonettes of Slaanesh 6"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Alluress The leader of this unit is the Alluress. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Alluress' Piercing Claws.
        Banner Bearers You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Banner Bearers.
        Hornblower 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly Hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can either be a Daemonette Banner Bearer or Daemonette Icon Bearer.
        Icon Bearer If an unmodified battleshock roll of 1 is made for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Icon Bearers, you can add D6 models to this unit, and no models from this unit will flee in that phase
        Lithe and Swift This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Piercing Claws Melee1"24+4+-11

      • Seekers [120pts]

        Selections: 5 Seekers [120pts], Heartseeker, Hornblower, Piercing Claws, Poisoned Tongue, Seeker Icon Bearer, Standard Bearer

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SEEKERS, SLAANESH, Other

        Unit: Seekers, Unit Abilities: Heartseeker, Hornblower, Icon and Standard Bearers, Quicksilver Speed, Seeker Banner Bearer, Seeker Icon Bearer, Soul Hunters, Weapon: Piercing Claws, Poisoned Tongue


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Seekers 14"2105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Heartseeker 1 model in this unit can be a Heartseeker. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Heartseeker’s Piercing Claws.
        Hornblower 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Hornblower. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of this unit while this unit includes any Seeker Hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Banner Bearer, and 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Icon Bearer.
        Quicksilver Speed You can roll 2D6 instead of D6 when you make a run roll for this unit. In addition, this unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Seeker Banner Bearer You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Seeker Banner Bearers.
        Seeker Icon Bearer If an unmodified battleshock roll of 1 is made for this unit while it includes any Seeker Icon Bearers, you can add D3 models to this unit, and no models from this unit will flee in that phase.
        Soul Hunters If any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this unit’s attacks in the combat phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons in the next combat phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Piercing Claws Melee1"24+4+-11
        Poisoned Tongue Melee1"24+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Slaanesh

          Selections: Pretenders Host

          Battalion Organisation: Pretenders Hedonite Host, Battle Trait: Euphoric Killers, Feast of Depravities, Heir to the Throne, Hosts of Slaanesh, Locus of Diversion, Warlord Supreme, Depravity Point Table: (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets, (02) 30 Daemonettes, (03) 3 Seeker Chariots, (04) 20 Daemonettes, (05) 1 Contorted Epitome, (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot, (07) 3 Feinds, (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer, (09) 1 Exalted Chariot, (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh, (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot, (12) 1 Hellflayer, (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh, (14) 1 Seeker Chariot, (15) 5 Seekers, (16) 10 Daemonettes


        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Pretenders Hedonite Host A Supreme Sybarites battalion in a PRETENDERS HOST army must have only 1 CHAOS SLAANESH HERO instead of 3-6.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Euphoric Killers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a CHAOS SLAANESH model is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. If the attacking model’s unit has 20 or more models, its attacks inflict 3 hits on an unmodified hit roll of 6 instead.
        Feast of Depravities You can summon units of SLAANESH DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough depravity points (DPs). Each time a wound or mortal wound is inflicted on an enemy model by an attack made by a friendly SLAANESH HERO or a spell cast by a friendly SLAANESH HERO, and that enemy model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point. In addition, every time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly SLAANESH HERO and not negated, and that friendly model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point.

        If you have any depravity points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the list below to the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of depravity points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough depravity points to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly SLAANESH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of depravity points you have immediately after it has been set up.
        Heir to the Throne If the general of a PRETENDERS HOST army is a HERO, they have 2 different command traits instead of 1 command trait. If you randomly generate the traits, roll again if the second result is the same as the first. In addition, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee and missile weapons by friendly PRETENDERS HOST units while they have 10 or more models.
        Hosts of Slaanesh After you have chosen the Slaanesh allegiance for your army, you must also choose a Host of Slaanesh keyword for your army. You can choose for your army to be an INVADERS HOST, a PRETENDERS HOST, or a GODSEEKERS HOST. All units in your army gain the keyword of the host that you have chosen. All units with that keyword benefit from the host’s allegiance abilities, which are presented on the following pages, in addition to the allegiance abilities they have for being from a Slaanesh army.
        Locus of Diversion At the end of the charge phase, each friendly HEDONITE HERO that is within 6" of an enemy unit can create a locus of diversion. If they do so, pick 1 enemy unit that is within 6" of that HEDONITE HERO and roll a dice, adding 2 if that HEDONITE HERO is a GREATER DAEMON. On a 5+, that enemy unit fights at the end of the following combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight in that combat phase. You cannot pick the same unit as the target for this ability more than once in the same charge phase (whether the roll is successful or not).

        If a unit that is affected by this battle trait is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the following combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Warlord Supreme At the start of your hero phase, you receive D3 depravity points if your general is within 3" of any enemy units. If your general is within 3" of 3 or more enemy units at the start of your hero phase, you receive D6 depravity points instead of D3.
        Depravity Point Table Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets 45
        (02) 30 Daemonettes 40
        (03) 3 Seeker Chariots 35
        (04) 20 Daemonettes 28
        (05) 1 Contorted Epitome 23
        (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot 23
        (07) 3 Feinds 23
        (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer 20
        (09) 1 Exalted Chariot 20
        (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh 17
        (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot 17
        (12) 1 Hellflayer 17
        (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh 15
        (14) 1 Seeker Chariot 15
        (15) 5 Seekers 15
        (16) 10 Daemonettes 14

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

  • **Pitched Battle** (Chaos - Beasts of Chaos) [200pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Other [200pts]

      • Cockatrice [100pts]

        Selections: Petrifying Gaze, Sword-like Talons, Vicious Beak

        Categories: CHAOS, MONSTER, BEASTS OF CHAOS, COCKATRICE, MONSTERS OF CHAOS, Other

        Unit: Cockatrice, Unit Abilities: Fly, Maddened Ferocity, Petrifying Gaze, Weapon: Petrifying Gaze, Sword-like Talons, Vicious Beak


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Cockatrice 12"856+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Maddened Ferocity A Cockatrice has an Attacks characteristic of 8 instead of 4 with its Sword-like Talons if it made a charge move in the same turn.
        Petrifying Gaze Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Cockatrice's Petrifying Gaze. Instead, roll a dice. On a 4+ the target suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Petrifying Gaze Missile10"*****
        Sword-like Talons Melee1"44+4+-1
        Vicious Beak Melee2"24+3+-1D3

You cannot pick the same unit as the target for this ability more than once in the same charge phase (whether the roll is successful or not).

        If a unit that is affected by this battle trait is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the following combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Warlord Supreme At the start of your hero phase, you receive D3 depravity points if your general is within 3" of any enemy units. If your general is within 3" of 3 or more enemy units at the start of your hero phase, you receive D6 depravity points instead of D3.
        Depravity Point Table Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets 45
        (02) 30 Daemonettes 40
        (03) 3 Seeker Chariots 35
        (04) 20 Daemonettes 28
        (05) 1 Contorted Epitome 23
        (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot 23
        (07) 3 Feinds 23
        (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer 20
        (09) 1 Exalted Chariot 20
        (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh 17
        (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot 17
        (12) 1 Hellflayer 17
        (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh 15
        (14) 1 Seeker Chariot 15
        (15) 5 Seekers 15
        (16) 10 Daemonettes 14

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
